legal_basis: s. 78(4) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
decision_reasoning: officer failed to consider special circumstances
application_details: Marr lacked one year of study due to Scotland's shorter education system but held a two-year post-secondary credential
result_of_case: decision being set aside and remitted for redetermination
procedure_followed: Judicial review was granted, and the Federal Court reviewed the officer's decision regarding Marr's application
cause_of_action: Marrâ€™s application was refused due to insufficient points, partly because the officer did not apply s. 78(4) properly
